alert.note: Alert for Blount; Jefferson; St. Clair; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Walker, southwestern Blount, northeastern Jefferson and northwestern St. Clair Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arkadelphia to Inland Lake. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springville, Dallas, Clay, Warrior, Kimberly, Morris, Locust Fork, Trafford, Allgood, Hayden, County Line, Blount Springs, Inland Lake, Arkadelphia, Empire, Smoke Rise, Holly Springs, Village Springs, Remlap and Clear Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
